name: Manual upload
description: Human-directed upload via SFTP, TACC.cloud API, Portal, Jupyter, or S3 mechanism

name: Manual retrigger
description: Human-directed invocation of processes that are normally automated

name: Automated process
description: A process that runs automatically and without human intervention

name: Jupyter Notebook
description: Human-directed process run from within a Jupyter Notebooks environment

name: Uploads Indexer
description: A Reactor that indexes the managed uploads directory

name: Jobs Indexer
description: A Reactor that indexes compute job output directories

name: Products Indexer
description: A Reactor that indexes compute job output files to their sources

name: Basemount Reactor
description: Automated process that transfers files from Basespace to managed storage
